messages.content: Recent studies indicate that intermittent fasting can modestly improve insulin sensitivity. An 8‑week regimen lowered HOMA‑IR by 15% in overweight participants, while a 12‑hour time‑restricted feeding window improved fasting glucose by 10%. Animal work also suggests enhanced insulin signaling with cyclic fasting protocols.

Animal work also suggests enhanced insulin signaling with cyclic fasting protocols.*
